rationale: The segment uses neutral language without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
Plain statements about health status, no moderate verb + scale.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports details of the individual who died, lacking explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
Provides details about a case, not capability or preparedness.
The segment reports patient history/conditions, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
The segment reports details about an individual's health, not speculation about future relief or improvement.
Authorial statement provides factual description of the case.
Factual reporting of patient history without explicit framing cues.
